#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
struct node{
ll first;
int second;};
bool comp(struct node a,struct node b)
{
    if(a.first>b.first) return false;
    else if(a.first==b.first && a.second<b.second)return false;
    else return true;
}
int main()
{
    long long n,k,i,j;
    long long x,y;
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    //while(t--)
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    struct node nd;
    vector<node >v;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++ )
    {
       scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y) ;
       nd.first=x*y;
       nd.second=i+1;
       v.push_back(nd);

    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end(),comp);
    long q;
    scanf("%ld",&q);
    while(q--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&j);
        printf("%d\n",v[n-1-(j-1)].second);
    }



    return 0;
}
